trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsModeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示方法，處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged>就會引發事件時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制的變更。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsModeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsModeEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
